name: Mage arena: The thing under the tower
name_original: Mage arena: The thing under the tower
description:
A short game in the arena-shooter style. Heavily inspired by games such as devil daggers.

Features:

  • Intense action gameplay.
  • An infinite number of waves of enemies.
  • A boss to defeat.
  • Two different weapons/spells (one unlockable) with a few upgrades to be looted from enemies.

This was by and large just a short project for myself to improve my C# coding and learn som basic asset creation in blender (3d models) and audacity (sound recording & editing).

Game was heavily inspired by the excellent Devil Daggers.
